name: Coast Guard Sniper Shooter
description: Coast Guard Sniper Shooter is one of the best action and shooting games with suitable controls and amazing environment.It has stunning graphics and complete face with outstanding environment.it has excellent weapons and well shooting skills.each person love to play this game for their health.this is very interusting and pro,shooting game.you need a well trained sniper shooter to kill the enemies and complete your mission.this game has great levels each level has different view.it has a modern and extreme adventure of gunfire.it hasa a wonderful and powerful shooting technique. This action game has realistic and awesome design with exciting focus in fire armn.this game includes affective rank and specific range.complete you missions and prove your self a sharpshooter. Good Luck
